channel.title: Empyrean - RSPS Evolved
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/BN64hvL.png[/img]
[SIZE=2]Empyrean is a hardcore economy server which features rewarding-style gameplay. Every achievement and effort that you do to succeed is well worth the reward. Our hardest bosses, as well as others, are all placed in dangerous PvP areas, creating a new dynamic for an economy server. Not only does this make PvP exciting and fun, but it also adds value to every single boss you slay. On top of this we offer many other systems that make the game fun such as Boss pets with bonuses, venom system along with Zulrah and all the Zulrah items, Completionist cape for the skillers out there, Treasure loots for doing simple things like voting or getting a pk, and much much more![/SIZE]
Website: [url=http://empyreanpk.org]http://empyreanpk.org[/url] Play Now: [url=http://empyreanpk.org/client.jar]http://empyreanpk.org/client.jar[/url] Forums: [url=http://empyreanpk.org/forum]http://empyreanpk.org/forum[/url]

item.title: Empyrean - RSPS Evolved
item.dc:creator: @CleanCut CleanCut
item.description:
@CleanCut wrote:

[quote=“youmakeit, post:8, topic:552267”]Great server with loads of content. 99% uptime with a nice community. PVM is great, eating is great, and PVP is great.
Very simple. If you can get passed the first encounter with the community you’re golden.[/quote]

Glad you like it thanks for joining.

Read full topic

item.title: Empyrean - RSPS Evolved
item.dc:creator: @youmakeit youmakeit
item.description:
@youmakeit wrote:

Welliton_inc:

Judging by the post count of the account, and the fact you say “eating is great”. It makes me think that you’re just using this account to bump your thread. If so, not cool.

I see where you’re coming from thinking that I’m just another account of the poster, but I’m not. It’s sad how if I post the good things about a server, people think that I’m a bot, or just a random account, while if I post about the bad things people don’t even bat an eye.

Although it’s a great server, the community is blood thirsty, hunting the wilderness and making it almost impossible to kill monsters in peace. Players get 3-5 points a boss kill, while the best items in the point store cost nearly 5000.

Now that I’ve stated what I hate about the server, let me be; and don’t jump to conclusions so quickly.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“furyking50, post:6, topic:552267”]Server isn’t bad but imo i would say it isnt ‘noob friendly’ lol
everyone kills me in like 6 seconds lol
Good luck[/quote]

Haha well thanks for giving it a try.
